amendment.description: Amendment first reduces and then increases funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $4 milllion in order to address the U.S.-Israel Energy Cooperation Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce and then increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $4 milllion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
